title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 December 2014 - XWiki
content:
<\_cjd> has quit  
08:37 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:52 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:07 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <vmassol> good morning  
09:36 <vmassol> today is release day for 6.4M1 normally, hope we can make it :)  
09:40 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <lucaa> has quit  
10:00 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <tmortagne> guys could you close/move/whatever all the open issues assigned to 6.4M1  
10:13 <tmortagne> (and which are not planned for 6.4M1)  
10:13 <tmortagne> looks like we have 2 blockers  
10:14 <Slashman> has quit  
10:15 <vmassol> and 4 critical  
10:16 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11443 could also be a blocker since it's a regression appaerntly  
10:16 <tmortagne> do we really want to fix XWIKI-11459 ?  
10:16 <vmassol> not sure http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11416 is critical  
10:17 <vmassol> moving to major  
10:17 <tmortagne> vmassol: XWIKI-11443  is not really a bug, it's more about the default configuration  
10:17 <tmortagne> currently by default there is no default base skin  
10:18 <tmortagne> but we could decide to put back one  
10:18 <tmortagne> since  XWIKI-11460 allow FS skin to bypass the default base skin  
10:19 <tmortagne> (we don't want colibri to inherit Flamingo or the opposite)  
10:22 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <tmortagne> there is lots of "missing documentation for closed JIRA issues for version 6.4-milestone-1"  
10:26 <tmortagne> especially vmassol and mflorea  
10:26 <vmassol> yes I have a few I know of, I'll look at them  
10:26 <tmortagne> http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=Project%20in%20%28%22XWiki%20Commons%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Rendering%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Platform%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Enterprise%22%29%20and%20fixVersion%20in%20%28%226.4-milestone-1%22%29%20and%20resolution%20in%20%28%22Fixed%22%29%20and%20%28%28Documentation%20is%20EMPTY%29%20or%20%28%22Documentation%20in%20Release%20Notes%22%20is%20EMPTY%29%29  
10:27 <tmortagne> is it me or jira is pretty slow ?  
10:27 <vmassol> it's slow  
10:27 <vmassol> caused by me  
10:27 <vmassol> by error  
10:27 <vmassol> :)  
10:27 <tmortagne> ok  
10:28 <vmassol> I went to the manage add on screen and I don't know how but I clicked somewhere without seeing where I clicked  
10:28 <vmassol> and it started upgrading the Universal Plugin Manager  
10:28 <vmassol> (some ajax screen popped up in front of my mouse somehow when I was clicking)  
10:28 <vmassol> it loaded up to 80% and then stopped...  
10:29 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:31 <AFKGeek> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <Pbas> Hello, a nice committer could commit my tiny improvement? http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11498? thxs  
10:56 <Lyes1> has joined #xwiki  
10:56 <Lyes> has quit  
11:45 <ClemensR> Pbas: I guess because release  '6.4-milestone-1'  is in progress, this might need a moment ...  
11:58 <Lyes1> has quit  
11:59 <Pbas> K thxs for your answer Clement. It is not problem  
12:13 <ClemensR> Pbas: but I agree it helps to ping from time to time, these pull requests seen to fall through the cracks some times ...  
12:20 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
12:37 <lucaa1> has quit  
13:18 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
13:46 <vmassol> sorry for the jira spam… fixed all issues with no asignee in top level projects...
